Interface IUserManager

Interface containing all the methods that are used to manage users in the library.

Namespace: ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface
Assembly: ManageUsers.dll
Syntax
public interface IUserManager

Methods

ActivateUserAsync(Int32, String)

CreateUserAsync(String, String, String, String, String)

Creates a new user and inserts it into the database. The address of the user will be null. No usertype set, so the default usertype "User" is assigned to the user.

Declaration
Task CreateUserAsync(string email, string password, string passwordConfirmed, string firstname, string lastname)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String email

The email of the user.
System.String password

The password of the user.
System.String passwordConfirmed

The password must be confirmed before it can be set.
System.String firstname

The firstname of the user.
System.String lastname

The lastname of the user.
Returns
Type Description

DoesUserHaveCorrectUsertypeAsync(String, String)

Checks if the user from the jwt token has the correct usertype.

Declaration
Task<bool> DoesUserHaveCorrectUsertypeAsync(string jwtToken, string requiredUsertype)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String jwtToken

The jwt token to get the usertype from.
System.String requiredUsertype

A string of the name of the usertype that is required.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Boolean>

True if the usertype of the user is the same as the one required, false otherwise.
